reviewText: Of all the DVDs on veil work, this is my personal favorite! It goes beyond moves taught in Veil with Aziza Belly Dance Instruction DVD I love working with a silk veil and Katia's unique take on movement and presentation takes veil work from the ordinary to the dramatic. It's definitely for the advance dancer who wants to do more with veil. The only down side is that this requires a extra long veil which can difficult to find.

Katia is an excellent instructor, she shows you movements, combinations and ways to master some of the basic veil skills and incorporate them into your performances. She paces the lessons very well and adds on technique options to increase your knowledge of veils. The DVD is finished of with a lovely performance. If you have had no veil experience this DVD is great.

Katia is a lovely person/teacher.  Please know that this dvd is specificly for the extra-long light veils.  If you are looking for a regular veil dvd, then maybe look into gettng Aziza's, Amaya's, or Cory Zamoras.
I really love this DVD.  It is full of wonderful techniques with plenty of revision and lots of practical information.  I have begun using the techniques in my own choreography.  Thankyou.
